title: Update head metadata URLs to use relative paths and verithos.io base

requirements.summary: Adjust frontend index.html head metadata to remove verithos.com, prefer relative URLs, and use verithos.io only where absolute URLs are required.
acceptanceCriteria: `<meta property="og:image">` uses a relative path (`/assets/verithos-logo-rgb-shield.png`) rather than an absolute domain URL.
`<link rel="dns-prefetch">` entries do not reference `verithos.com` (replace with `//verithos.io` and, if kept, `//www.verithos.io`).

file_operations.description: Update only <head> metadata URL fields: replace canonical and og:url with https://verithos.io/; replace og:image absolute URL with relative /assets/verithos-logo-rgb-shield.png; replace any dns-prefetch entries from //verithos.com and //www.verithos.com to //verithos.io (and optionally keep //www.verithos.io); ensure no remaining verithos.com references and keep favicon href as the existing relative /assets/verithos-logo-rgb-shield.png. Limit changes strictly to these metadata/URL adjustments.
